nodes.text: Star Wars: Feel the Force! is a Star Wars Legends DK Readers Level 3 title that explores the various aspects of the Force. It was written by Benjamin Harper and was published by DK Publishing on January 17, 2011.
The book was reissued with new cover art as part of the Learn to Read with Star Wars: Yoda Level 3 box set on December 12, 2017.
Feel the Force looks at the mysterious Force from the Star Wars universe, exploring both its light side and its dark side, and its potential for good and evil.
